data.name: Multiverse Designer
data.detailed_description:
Multiverse Designer is a 3D narrative engine that allows you to create unique settings with a vast library of 3D assets, and populate them with animated models of characters and monsters. Use them as a virtual tabletop to host and play any RPG with your friends in immersive sessions where they’ll see only what their character sees, thanks to a dynamic light and shadows system. A tool as powerful and intuitive that will take your game sessions (online or physical) to the next level!

A POWERFUL CREATIVE TOOL FOR DMs AND NARRATORS


Design and create all kinds of settings (fantasy, sci-fi, etc) with a vast library of 3D assets, powered by the Unreal engine: dungeons, taverns, palaces, workshops, forests, mountains – whatever your creative mind can think of! Define dynamic light sources to create the illumination of each area, set interactive objects such as doors, traps or chests, and populate your setpieces with animated models of NPCs and monsters – all with an intuitive drag-and-drop UI that you can master in minutes!

Everything you see is customizable, like the texture and colors of floor tiles or walls, and you can create environments with several heights. With full Steam Workshop support, you can export your creations to share them with other players and DMs – as well as play other people’s adventures and setpieces. You can even import external 3D assets to grow your library with new creatures and items. Multiverse Designer is the ultimate narrative engine to make your imagination come to life!

AN IMMERSIVE VIRTUAL TABLETOP FOR YOUR GAMING SESSIONS


Control your character in an incredibly immersive 3D environment and fog of war, where you’ll only see what your character can see, thanks to its dynamic lights and shadows that track every light source in real time. Throw all kinds of virtual dice to decide your fate. Create your character sheet and keep notes of your progress and discoveries – you’ll have everything you need to enjoy the most engaging roleplaying experience, using it as your virtual tabletop, or even as a support tool for your physical game nights!

Multiverse Designer is not tied to any specific RPG system, and you can adapt it to your favorite games. You can fight your way through dangerous dungeons in edge-of-your-seat sessions of Dungeons & Dragons or Pathfinder, slowly crawl down ominous haunted houses in a thrilling Call of Cthulhu investigation… Multiverse Designer is the perfect environment for your best adventures, the best tool for an unforgettable tabletop RPG experience.

KEY FEATURES


  • Create amazing 3D setpieces with an intuitive drag-and-drop UI, supporting multiple heights, all powered by the Unreal engine
  • Make every environment unique with a vast library of hundreds of 3D assets for fantasy, sci-fi, and realistic settings
  • Customize everything, from the textures and color of floor tiles, walls, and doors, to the temperature of light sources
  • Populate your creations with animated models of monsters and non-playable characters
  • Light your scenarios with dynamic light sources (lamps, torches, fireplaces…) that create areas of shadows
  • Share your creations with the world or play other people’s adventures thanks to full Steam Workshop support!
  • Grow your library with imported external 3D assets
  • Use your creations as a virtual tabletop for your gaming sessions with virtual dice, character sheets, and all the tools you need for your RPG nights!
  • Put yourself in your character’s shoes: control your 3D model with dynamic fog of war where you see only what your character sees
  • Host online multiplayer RPG sessions, or use Multiverse Designer as a virtual support tool in your physical games with your friends

data.short_description: Multiverse Designer is a 3D narrative engine and virtual tabletop to power your tabletop RPG games and help you create amazing stories in unique settings. Gather your friends, create awe-inspiring 3D setpieces, control characters and NPCs and throw virtual dice to decide the fate of your players!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5 GHz, AMD Ryzen 3 3300U, or equivalen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960, AMD R9 280, or equivalent DX11 GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700, AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT, or equivalent GPU
